CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Compared with PzNDTDTBT / PzNDTDTBO , PSCs based on PzNDTTPD shows higher V oc , which corresponds to the deepest HOMO energy level of PzNDTTPD ( see Table 2 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBT |
| PzNDTDTBO |
| PSCs |
| PzNDTTPD |

Explanation:

* PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO are mentioned as materials in the first part of the sentence.
* PSCs (which stands for "Perovskite Solar Cells") is also mentioned as a material.
* PzNDTTPD is mentioned as a material in the second part of the sentence.

All of these are identified as "Material Name" entities.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBT |
| PzNDTDTBO |
| PzNDTTPD |

Explanation:

* PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO are mentioned as materials in the first part of the sentence.
* PzNDTTPD is mentioned as a material in the second part of the sentence.

PSCs is not included as it is an abbreviation for "Perovskite Solar Cells" and it is not clear if it refers to a specific material or a type of material.
